faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subcopy: Here are answers to your most common questions.

items.question: How do you protect my personal data?
items.answer: At NordBay, your data security is a top priority. We use encryption and do not share your information with third parties.

items.question: What should I do if I have a problem with a purchase?
items.answer: Our support is available to help you. Contact us via chat or email, and we will resolve your issue quickly.

items.question: Can I trust the sellers?
items.answer: Yes, all our sellers are verified and transactions are protected by Stripe/MobilePay.

items.question: Is there any cost to use NordBay?
items.answer: We do not charge hidden fees. What you see is what you get.
